question: Can I change my coach?
generated_answer:
Yes, you can change your coach. If you feel that you need a different coach to support you on your weight loss journey, Voy's Support Team is available to assist with this change. You cannot make this change by yourself directly in the app or website, but by contacting the Support Team via email or starting a chat in the app, they will facilitate the switch for you as soon as possible.

For any additional support or questions, you're encouraged to reach out to Voy's Support Team. They are committed to helping you and ensuring you have the right guidance and motivation throughout your journey.

If you're unsure who to contact or if you have not yet chosen a coach, you should start with the Customer Care Team. They will guide you to the appropriate team or help you select a coach through the 'Choose a coach' option on the Support page of your account.

For further assistance or to communicate with your coach for motivation, support, and guidance, you can use the messages feature on your support page, communicate via WhatsApp (initiated by your coach), or book a face-to-face appointment through the Support page.

Remember, the goal is to ensure you feel supported and motivated throughout your weight loss journey with Voy.

For more detailed information or to reach out for support, please refer to Voy's official documentation or contact their Support Team directly.
reference_answer:
We completely understand that finding the right coach is important for your journey. While you’re not able to make this change on your own, our friendly Support Team is here to help! Simply send us an email or start a chat in the App, and we’ll take care of the switch for you as soon as possible.
If there’s anything else we can do to support you, just let us know—we’re always happy to help!
